name: Wild Horse Canyon Scenic Backcountry Byway
description:
Centrally located in Mojave National Preserve, this National Park Service
Backcountry Byway is a gravel road that passes near Wild Horse Mesa and the
colorful volcanic formations of Hole-in-the-Wall.
fullDescription: Centrally located in Mojave National Preserve, this National Park Service Backcountry Byway is a gravel road that passes near Wild Horse Mesa and the colorful volcanic formations of Hole-in-the-Wall. Camping is available at two locationson this route: Mid Hills Campground and Hole-in-the-Wall Campground.
